reviewText: Really good TV show and wonderful for someone trying to learn Spanish.

I finished watching this series on Netflix Latin America and couldn't wait to have it with me to see it anytime I wanted to, and take it with me wherever I travelled to. So happy I finally have it! The package arrived fast and in great conditions.

Very captivating story lines from the very first episode. Great for practicing my Spanish listening skills. I was hoping to be able to use it my classroom, but the language and some of the content may be a little too mature. But, personally, I'm loving it!
My favorite series, hands down.  I wish it supported english subtitles, but oh well.  As others have stated, you need a special dvd player.  Theyre easy to find, i bought one here on amazon

If you want to use this to help with learning Spanish, go for it. But if you want a plot that actually makes sense and won't make you groan throughout a lot of it, you'll probably have to try something else. I watched the whole thing because I'm studying Spanish, and it was helpful to learn more modern idioms and words, but there were times I was just yelling at the screen things like, "Oh please!" and "Yeah, right!" There were some attractive characters, but really it was so far-fetched as to be laughable, and I really didn't like the end either. I think Ramon Campos has improved over the years. His storylines are a little more believable in series like Gran Hotel and Velvet, which I do recommend.
Love this series it keeps you hooked up just want to continue watching it.
Love this program.  I'm using it in my Spanish class and the students can't wait for the next episode!

Excellent!!!! Delivered wayyy to early that I expected due it is from Spain. Obviously as a DVD quality, and sometimes the image get darker. Also you will need a multiregion DVD, because Region 1 DVD or blu ray doesn't read it. I have a multiregion from Mexico, so whatever that said multiregion must be work.  I'm a happy with the faster delivered and I didn't finished yet, but the DVD physically look perfect.
